skills Highly motivated enthusiastic and selfstarter Work Experience JavaJ2EE Developer Equifax Alpharetta GA June 2018 to Present Equifax is a Consumer credit reporting agency It collects and aggregates information on individual consumers Equifax sells credit monitoring and fraudprevention services directly to the consumers and to credit reporting agencies The web application provides functionalities such as profile management and user validation Roles and Responsibilities Worked in agile framework as an individual contributor Responsibilities include Interaction with Business team in story grooming reviewing storyacceptance criteria Successfully implemented Web Services and exposed the service to the inter application communication Implemented REST Microservices using spring boot Generated Metrics with method level granularity and Persistence using Spring AOP and Spring Actuator Implemented service layer using Spring IOC and annotations and Controllers using Spring MVC Worked on Rest Web services and used Micro services architectural style to develop the application Worked on Spring IOC Spring Boot Spring Cloud and used ORM framework like Hibernate Implemented the project as a multitier application using Spring MVC Spring boot Microservices used core Spring concepts like MVC AOP IOC Used databases like Cassandra and MongoDB Participating in meetings with business teams understand requirements for 3 weeks duration as our project follows monthly deployments We do daily standup calls with onshore team Implemented the front end using Html5 CSS3 AngularJS and used NodeJS to get the data from MongoDB database Responsible for creating Controllers Service and DAO classes and bug fixing Responsible for code update into TortoiseGit and support for automated builds successful JavaJ2EE Developer Nivid Technologies Sterling VA May 2017 to June 2018 Our company provides services to its direct clients and I was involved in a project which involves the design and development of a Web based application to provide online insurance services The web application provides functionalities such as policy management profile management and claim reporting The customer can access complete account information policy information and report a claim Roles and Responsibilities Involved in Analyzing Software Requirements Specification Design and implementation of application using Agile Scrum methodology Extensively worked on both consumption production of RESTful based Web services using JAXRS jersey parsers Implemented the project as a multitier application using Spring MVC Spring boot Microservices used core Spring concepts like MVC AOP IOC Expertise in Core Java with strong understanding and working knowledge of Object Oriented Concepts like Collections Multithreading Concurrency framework Developed applications using the latest Java J2EE technologies and worked with the latest features of Java 8 and Java 7 Used GitHub for efficiently Limited Hyderabad Telangana June 2014 to December 2014 This application is developed for our employee recruitment system This Recruitment System is a webbased tool used to make the recruiting process of an organization simple This allows Job applicants to register their details such as skills experience education details and accomplishments into the system It also allows employers to post their requirements on the internet which helped to announce requirements without any medium in between It also sends automatic email updates with new requirements links to the registered candidates Roles
